Here's what has happened in COMP 401-001 on Piazza:

------------------------------------------------------------
GrayPixel to ColorPixel  (2/01/16 11:32 AM)

Should Assignment 3 be able to take a GrayPixel and use the blend method wi=
th a ColorPixel and a factor and be able to produce a ColorPixel? =C2=A0

ken=3Df2GxNxqCfOm to view.

Assignment 3  (2/01/16 1:08 PM)

I assume since he stated we could share test code and encouraged it for ass=
ignment 2, we can share test code for assignment 3. =C2=A0

At the end of Jedi, I just wrote another class in the same package called t=
est and wrote a program to go through a couple of tests. =C2=A0It's pretty =
self-evident.
Here is my Test Class

pdate it. =C2=A0
